timelineItems.name: Paddy Sisyphus
timelineItems.text: A lack of widely available South Korean #KOR wines means tonight's #WorldCupWine is a south Australian #AUS Shiraz (contains word 'south').

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, South Korea 0, Belgium 1.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup Round of 16 by confederation: UEFA 6, CONMEBOL 5, CONCACAF 3, Africa 2, Asia 0.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Man United is the only club with 6 different goalscorers at this #WorldCup. All 6 are from different countries.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: ESPN's TV commentators for the #WorldCup Round of 16: http://t.co/UjnyQpkItU

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazilians to score four #WorldCup goals before turning 23: Pelé, Ronaldo, Neymar. #BRA

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: South American Saturday in the Round of 16. Today's #WorldCup coverage: #BRA-#CHI: 11:30 AM ET, ABC #COL-#URU: 3:30 ET, ABC

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: First #WorldCup extra-time game for Chile. Seventh for Brazil, first since 1998 semis vs Netherlands.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazil's only #WorldCup extra-time goals were by Leonidas in 1938. Scoreless in extra time in 5 straight since.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Host nations have won three straight #WorldCup shootouts, but are just 3-2 overall.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 22-year-old James Rodríguez is the youngest player with 5 goals in a #WorldCup since...Thomas Müller in 2010.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7.7% - #GRE have the worst chance conversion rate of the 16 teams to make it past the #WorldCup Group Stage. Icarus.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 5 - Juan Guillermo Cuadrado has four assists at the #WorldCup but managed just five goal assists in 32 games in 2013-14 Serie A. Purple.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 21 - Only #CMR have allowed their opponents more shots on target against them than #NGA in the #WorldCup Group Stages. Open.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 2014 #WorldCup has 136 goals, most ever in a group stage. 2.8 goals/game is most in group stage since 1958.

timelineItems.text: 'Good touch by Kim' 'just slicing away from Kim's goal'.. Do the commentators not got fed up? #KOR

timelineItems.text: Group H #BEL: Clinch 1st w/ draw #ALG: Advance w/ win or draw & #KOR loss #RUS: Advance w/ win & #KOR loss/draw #KOR: Must win & make up GD

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 6 - If #KOR fail to qualify it will mean just six of 32 entrants to World Cups from Asia will have made it past the first round. Struggles.

timelineItems.name: Finegan Joseph
timelineItems.text: So #BEL v #KOR or #ALG v #RUS? I want to check BEL out, but reckon #ALGRUS will be a better contested game. #bigdecisions - 9mins to make it

timelineItems.name: Këith
timelineItems.text: I hope #Bel put on a show for us tonight.

timelineItems.name: Stephen Deloney
timelineItems.text: Now that's a national anthem! Go Belgium! Go Red Devils! #FifaWorldCup #BEL

timelineItems.name: Mike Collett-White
timelineItems.text: Corinthians arena not full for #KORBEL #KORvsBEL #worldcup2014. Surely #KOR can't make a great escape from Group H?

timelineItems.name: Brian Shotton
timelineItems.text: Teams like #KOR are frustrating, obvious elements of talent and get into good positions but are generally weak and like headless chickens.

timelineItems.name: Rodrigo Furlan
timelineItems.text: #allez #belgique #worldcup #brasil2014 #BEL #VaiCorinthians

timelineItems.comment: Eden Hazard (Belgium) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lee Chung-Yong (South Korea).

timelineItems.name: Arka Guha
timelineItems.text: In fairness to the #BEL squad, the world cup winning Brazil squad didn't peak until the later stages of the cup in 2002.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Eden Hazard (Belgium) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Hand ball by Jan Vertonghen (Belgium).

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: TIME ADDED ON: AS THINGS STAND: H1 #BEL H2 #ALG

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Chung-Yong (South Korea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ji Dong-Won.
Attempt blocked. Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Yong.
Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Daniel van Buyten.
Attempt saved. Lee Keun-Ho (South Korea) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lee Chung-Yong with a cross.
Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.

timelineItems.name: Adam Miezin
timelineItems.text: #USMNT beat #COL in their golden generation in '94. Beat #POR in theirs in 2002. You're next #BEL.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Divock Origi (Belgium) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Sanoj
timelineItems.text: #KOR once again proving that the hardest thing in football is to put the ball in the back of the net.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Anthony Vanden Borre (Belgium) because of an injury.
Foul by Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea).
Eden Hazard (Belgium) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Kelly
timelineItems.text: Vanden Borre. Another injury is so not what we even need. Kompany and Vermaelen are already injured. #BEL

timelineItems.name: RestoreOurDemocracy
timelineItems.text: #BEL have only conceded two goals in their three international games against #KOR. Wall. #WorldCup #KorBel

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Lee Yong (South Korea).
Divock Origi (Belgium) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Second Half ends, South Korea 0, Belgium 1.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
